      • expandAll

        public void expandAll(javax.swing.JTree tree,
             boolean expand)
        Expand/collapse utility method. If expand is true, expands all nodes in the tree. Otherwise collapses all nodes in the tree.
        Parameters:
        tree - The jtree to expand/collapse
        expand - If true, the method expands all nodes in the tree, otherwise it collapses all nodes in the tree.
